title: Tools
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 77 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 230L
description: Tools is about familiar tools that help us work. The picture-to-text correspondence helps readers learn the names of various tools and understand their functions. On the last page of the book, readers are challenged to identify additional tools.
meta: carrying, digging, knife, pounding, tools, wheelbarrow
Use the strategy of pausing to retell to clarify information in text
Sound Symbol Relationship : Associate the letter Tt with the /t/ sound
Nouns : Recognize nouns as naming words
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and read high-frequency words it and here

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
